Kidou Senshi Gundam Gaiden I: Senritsu no Blue
機動戦士ガンダム外伝Ⅰ 戦慄のブルー
name: Mobile Suit Gundam Side Story I: Senritsu no Blue
overview: Kidou Senshi Gundam Gaiden I: Senritsu no Blue (機動戦士ガンダム外伝Ⅰ 戦慄のブルー) is the first of three Kidou Senshi Gundam Gaiden games for the Sega Saturn.
